description: In this role you will; Lead architecture of large initiatives in scaling, security and availability. Build solutions that will deliver installation, monitoring and upgrade features for nosql and search clusters Work on challenging problems in areas such as data storage, query optimization, JVM performance optimization, security, machine learning and more. Produce bullet-proof code that is robust, efficient and scalable. Drive and work on algorithm and architecture design, execute and deliver results.
preferred_qualifications: 3+ years of professional software development experience in Java and Python, Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
